mapper.select: SELECT A.ANO AS ANO, A.ANAME AS ANAME, A.ATEL AS ATEL, A.AXPOINT AS AXPOINT, A.AYPOINT AS AYPOINT, A.AADDRNO AS AADDRNO, A.AADDR1 AS AADDR1, A.AADDR2 AS AADDR2, A.ALOGO AS ALOGO, TO_CHAR(AINSERTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS AINSERTDATE, TO_CHAR(AUPDATEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS AUPDATEDATE FROM ACADEMY A

SELECT A.SNO AS SNO, A.SNAME AS SNAME, A.SDAY AS SDAY, A.STIME AS STIME, A.SPEOPLE AS SPEOPLE, A.SPRICE AS SPRICE, A.ACADEMY_ANO AS ACADEMY_ANO, A.SDELETEYN AS SDELETEYN, TO_CHAR(SINSERTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SINSERTDATE, TO_CHAR(SUPDATEDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SUPDATEDATE FROM SUBJECT A
